snippet: Public contact between the representatives of the Taliban and Pakistani government resumed on Wednesday as Prime Minister Nawaz Sharif made another push to put a wavering peace dialogue back on track.
abstract: Public contact between representatives of the Taliban and Pakistani government resume as Prime Min Nawaz Sharif makes another push to put a wavering peace dialogue back on track.
lead_paragraph: Public contact between the representatives of the Taliban and Pakistani government resumed on Wednesday as Prime Minister Nawaz Sharif made another push to put a wavering peace dialogue back on track.
